title: शेरनीयों का ये दल ठाणे में नही बल्कि गुजरात के जूनागढ़ शहर से है|
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Please note that Lions of #GirnarSanctuary are safe. Rains or no rains, these lions do cross through these parts of Junagadh city at times of their own free will. It is a natural behaviour of the lions in Girnar.
